map.legendDescription: Surface temperature anomaly (relative to the 1961-1990 global average temperature)

title: HadCRUT Surface Temperature Anomaly
subtitle: Surface temperature anomaly, measured in degrees celcius The temperature anomaly is relative to the 1951-1980 global average temperature. Data is based on the HadCRUT analysis from the Climatic Research Unit (University of East Anglia) in conjunction with the Hadley Centre (UK Met Office).
